subtitle: This is an all-in-one vegetable accompaniment to a main meal - as well as making a deliciously different snack meal

method.text: Place plantains in a frying pan. Add enough cold water to just cover. Bring to boil and simmer for 20-25 min or until tender.
Meanwhile, place potatoes in a pan of boiling water. Return to boil then simmer for 15 min or until tender.
Place cauliflower and carrots in a pan of boiling water. Return to boil then simmer for 10-15 min until tender.
Finally, place beans in a pan of boiling water. Return to boil then simmer for 5-6 min or until tender.

Drain all the vegetables well and set aside. Melt butter in a large frying pan and fry onion for 2-3 min or until softened. Add evaporated milk, cheese, nutmeg and seasoning. Heat through gently for 3-5 min until cheese has melted.
Add drained vegetables to the pan. Toss to mix well then spoon into a warmed serving dish. Serve immediately.

title: Plantain bake
